DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Disease or Disorder Resolution CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes if the disease was resolved.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Response Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Disease or Disorder Resolution
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the disease response domain.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._A means of finding a solution to a problem, or a means of finding agreement or harmony.
